page.title: 14Attitudes to amenities
page.content: {Health Lacock is quite well served for health facilities. There is a doctor's surgery in the village. Once a week the health visitor holds a clinic there and this has been of great help to the younger families in the village. Other services, such as chiropody, are available in nearby Melksham and Corsham, but the nearest hospital is in Chippenham. Most of the inhabitants of the village find the facilities adequate, but an improved bus service would improve things even more for the older people in the area.
